name: coffee-supply-chain
description: An Ethereum DApp that demonstrates a Supply Chain flow between actors of a coffee supply chain

scripts.install: (cd ./project-6 && npm i) & (cd ./project-6/client && npm i) & (cd ./project-6/server && npm i)
scripts.app-dev: (cd ./project-6/client && npm run dev) & (cd ./project-6/server && npm run dev)
scripts.start-app: (cd ./project-6/client && npm run start) & (cd ./project-6/server && npm run start)

author: Antoine LE GUILLOU
